title: Anneliese Dodds – 2022 Comments on Male Bias in Cabinet
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anneliese Dodds, the Chair of the Labour Party, on 25 October 2022.
content:
Just one in five of the ministers around Rishi Sunak’s Cabinet table are women.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

I know the Conservatives struggle to add up, but women make up half the population.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

This isn’t a fresh start, it’s just jobs for the boys.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
